document_data.caption: A map of Lapaliiya with the Sheir Peninsula in the middle, between Ormpur and Sheirtalar.
document_data.name: Sheir Peninsula
document_data.mainbody: The '''Sheir Peninsula''' was a peninsula in [[Lapaliiya]] in [[southwest Faerûn]]. It marked the northeastern border of the realm.
document_data.Geography: It was a massive [[granite]] outcrop extending westward into the [[Shining Sea]], bordered by cliffs that stood over 20 feet (6 meters) tall.
document_data.Inhabitants:
Around [[1373 DR]], the peninsula was dotted with thorps home to local shepherds. Forced to pay exorbitant rents to the Overking of Lapaliiya to use the land, these folk were often poverty-stricken.

The cliff faces, meanwhile, were inhabited by [[harpies]]. These creatures preyed on ships at sea, and the shepherds went nowhere near the coast.

On the northern foot stood the city of [[Ormpur]] and on the southern foot stood [[Sheirtalar]].
